departments.name: Press & Media
departments.description: Media inquiries, press releases, and interviews

faq.question: How do I download Princess Run 3D?
faq.answer: You can download Princess Run 3D from the App Store, Google Play Store, or our official website. The game is free to play with optional in-app purchases.

faq.question: What devices are supported?
faq.answer: Princess Run 3D supports iOS 12.0+ and Android 7.0+. The game is optimized for both smartphones and tablets.

faq.question: How do I unlock new outfits?
faq.answer: New outfits can be unlocked by playing the game, achieving high scores, completing achievements, or purchasing them with in-game currency.

faq.question: Is the game suitable for children?
faq.answer: Yes! Princess Run 3D is designed to be family-friendly and suitable for players aged 13 and above. Parental guidance is recommended for younger players.
